name: Rocket SHoot Soldier
description:
Rocket SHoot Soldier combines the adrenaline of platform-style games with the action of 2d shooters. Use the pad to move around and tap to jump and shoot. Use different guns and grenades too!
Features:
+ Classic arcade gameplay
+ Lots of bosses and metal tanks to fight.
+ Easy to use smooth control scheme
+ Amazing graphics, cool music and sound.
